name: Cat Face: Subject Code Forest
description:
What happens when you wake up in a forest, forgetting your whole identity?

A strange experiment, known as The Catamorphic experiments, has begun in a forest in the middle of nowhere. Another project called 'Substance X', A substance that grants the user power has been established on these premises. 

Fourteen original subjects were used, only some survived.

Cat-like creatures roamed the forests with the feeling of insanity, anger and grief.

For a whole year, bloodshed has occurred; many have died...

The experiment was going towards its end.

Then... something revolutionary happened.

A strange and mysterious person awakes, not knowing their whole identity. There only thoughts are that they need to find a way out.

To find a way out, they need to entrust themselves to someone or... something. 

Who will they trust? What will they do?

Mostly...

Who were you really?

Cat Face: Subject Code Forest, is a Visual Novel created by KitsuB. This is a demo of "Cat Face's Route".  More characters will be shown in the full game.

Socials: https://linktr.ee/KitsuB
